content: **christmas heart decoration in drops lima and drops kid-silk theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern li-170 yarn groups b + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- **size** width = 8 cm height = 7 cm without loop **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 9025 chalk and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25 g colour 38 chalk 1 heart weighs approx 4 g **needles** drops single pointed needle size 3 5 mm **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 40 row in height with garter stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
